title: Japan’s Financial Giants Unite for ‘Native’ Security Token Pilot
tags: Nomura Issues Security Tokens Backed by Domestic VC Fund Beneficial Interest Using J-Ships SchemeNomura Holdings, Nomura Asset Management, Nomura Trust and Banking, and BOOSTRY have completed issuance procedures for the “Nomura Private Series B Dash Fund 5 Tokenized VC Fund (Transfer-Restricted)”, a private placement security token totaling approximately 8 billion yen. The Fund is Japan’s first security token to invest in ventureJapan FinTech ObserverNorbert Gehrke
